name: Black Diamond Hotforge Hybrid QuickPack 12CM
description: A six-pack of HotForge hybrid draws with a HotForge and HotWire wire-gate carabiners threaded on a polyester dogbone. This is a great design in a multi-purpose draw with smooth-clipping wiregate action.HotForge on top and redesigned HotWire wire-gate on the bottom.Corrosion resistant anodized aluminum.Coloured bottom HotWire carabiner gives you something to aim for when clipping.Carabiners have a deep basket with a flattened bottom so ropes and webbing stays put.Equipped with an 18mm Polyester Dogbone with Straitjacket keeper.
